bug.author: kingvision
bug.summary: tiny-dnn does not support this layer type:slice
bug.description: Hi: i got an error: tiny-dnn does not support this layer type:slice. is there slice layer in tiny-dnn? thanks

comments.comment: It is supported. See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tiny-dnn/tiny-dnn/pull/233>#233</denchmark-link> . Are you using caffe converter?
Caffe converter still needs to support this. See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tiny-dnn/tiny-dnn/issues/146#issuecomment-233126470>#146 (comment)</denchmark-link>
Tiny-dnn still require maxout to be contributed then caffe convert could support it.
I close this as duplicate. Please open a new PR or ISSUE for maxout.
